About This Page

The "Edit Event" page is meant to allow members with appropriate privileges to edit the selected event.

It makes use of the following tags:

  • Channel:Form to display the channel entry form for users to edit an event.
  • Calendar:Date_Widget to display the Calendar date widget for editing Calendar event data.

The global sidebar on the right makes use of the following tags:

  • Calendar:Cal in Mini mode to display a Mini Calendar that links to days that have events.
  • Calendar:Calendars to display a list of all available Calendars.
